u3.aajaor2122.com

Class MyVTInstituteDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • u3.aajaor2122.com.MyVTInstituteDB

  • public class MyVTInstituteDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that hosts all the methods to achieve the DB functionality in the program: insert data, select specific results of data through querys. Gives all the necessary functionality to the program and connection with the database.

      • getAllCourses

        public static java.util.List<Course> getAllCourses()
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Retrieves all of the courses id´s and name´s registered into the database
        Returns:
        id´s and name´s of all courses in the database
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an error to retrieve all the Courses data

      • insertStudent

        public static void insertStudent(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String surname,
                                 int id,
                                 java.lang.String email,
                                 java.lang.String phone)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that allows to insert a new Student into the database
        Parameters:
        name - student´s name
        surname - student´s surname
        id - student´s id
        email - student´s email
        phone - student´s phone number
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an error at the time of inserting the new student

      • insertEnrollment

        public static void insertEnrollment(int studentId,
                                    int courseId)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that allows to enroll a registered Student into a given Course of our database
        Parameters:
        studentId - student´s id to enroll
        courseId - course in which the student will be enrolled
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an error at the time of enrolling the student into the selected course

      • printStudentString

        public static java.lang.String printStudentString(int idstudent)
                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Method that retrieves specific data about a student from our database, that later will be showed to the user when he selects the student´s id
        Parameters:
        idstudent - student´s id selected by the user
        Returns:
        a string with the prepared data: course name, subjects name and scores
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - an error to retrieve the selected data from the student

      • importXMLfile

        public static void importXMLfile(java.util.List<Student> studentList,
                                 java.util.List<Course> courseList,
                                 java.util.List<Subject> subjectList)
                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Method to insert all the parsed data from the XML file into the database. It works as a transaction: it only will commit the insert if all the operations are completed without errors.
        Parameters:
        studentList - list of students parsed from the XML file
        courseList - list of courses parsed from the XML file
        subjectList - list of subjects parsed from the XML file
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - some SQL error at the time of inserting the parsed data
